vclaim: The research and development of Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine, which proved to be 90% effective against SARS-CoV-2 in November 2020, was funded by U.S. President Donald Trump’s Operation Warp Speed.
title: Was Pfizer COVID-19 Vaccine Development Funded by Trump Administration?
subtitle: Agreeing to a buy a vaccine once approved is not the same as funding its research and development.
author: Madison Dapcevich
